column5: Flying cars... YES!  Not exactly what I thought they would be though...I picture what I saw on the back of Comic Book Mags.... (yes xray glasses really work!)  Here is the link   http://www.theregister.co.uk/2007/10/10/tr...uite_realistic/  there are three pages to the article..  Gerritt.  Perhaps a new business venture for you?
well if Wayne can slap on a set of floats  I will buy one....LOL
It will need riggers and rod holders too.
Thanks Bud! The flying car has been around for about 70 years now. And that one really flew...none of these "new" ones have done the test of time yet.  Floats Terry...coming right up...
